plot: In the face of daunting mystery a man is shaken to hysteria. Waking at 2 am to find daylight in his window, he runs flailing into the world looking for answers. Opening as understated horror, this film takes a sudden left turn into a dialog driven comedy about the nature of understanding, normality, and madness!
title: Dawn of Madness
